location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Copy of letter No 6/4 of 1873 from Colonel Lewis Pelly, On Special Duty, East African Special Mission, Zanzibar to Charles Umpherston Aitchison, Secretary to the Government of India, Foreign Department, Calcutta

mods.abstract: Letter confirming receipt of Despatch No.184 of 24 January 1873 and of the instructions contained within that he should submit his views to Government regarding the establishment of a Tribunal for the adjudication of cases in which British Subjects are plaintiffs and Persians defendants, once he has conferred with Sir Philip Francis, and once the draft order in council relating to Consular Jurisdiction has been completed.
